body:
For reference, there is an error thrown out when parsing the mask, `Unknown mask mode` :

https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/blob/master/lottie/src/main/java/com/airbnb/lottie/parser/MaskParser.java#L41

In this case, the under-going mode is "n" which has been supported (only "a", "s", "i" are supported).
Hey Pengxiang, mind updating your issue description to English to get help from engineers all over the world? Thanks
The animation does not show the complete middle white picture is not displayed
So how should I solve this problem? @boduan402

https://lottiefiles.com/share/JlZT1B    
Online parsing json animation is no problem

rename.to: The animation did not show complete

body:
have the similar problem。
in Android ，3.0.3-support
https://lottiefiles.com/share/34sn40

AFAIK, not all modes are supported:
https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-web/blob/master/docs/json/helpers/mask.json

https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/blob/master/lottie/src/main/java/com/airbnb/lottie/parser/MaskParser.java#L41
@huage2580 Please open a separate issue following the issue template. Every rendering issue is likely a separate issue.

issue.title: Add support for mask mode none

repository.name: lottie-android
repository.description: Render After Effects animations natively on Android and iOS, Web, and React Native

body: @gpeal  I am using version 3.2.2. The animation still cannot be displayed completely.  But the load from assets in the lottie sample can be displayed.  May I ask what is the reason

@zhupengxiang Because the fix went in after 3.2.2 was released
https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/commits/master

@gpeal Was this added in 3.3.0? I faced with the same issue my lottie file works great on iOs and in online [preview](https://lottiefiles.com/share/CEN1R4) but for [android](http://i.imgur.com/jLX0Csf.png) it doesn't display full animation. I use 3.3.0 lottie version.
@kirilamenski That is likely a separate issue. Please file a separate issue for it.
